entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
